resources.string:
Find out how much caffeine you consume with every sip of your favorite caffeinated beverage.

Kofe+ lets you know how much caffeine you consume every day as well as keeps track of caffeine level in your bloodstream at any given moment.

Note that caffeine amounts vary from drink to drink. The developer holds no responsibility for any misuse or abuse of this app.
